ccre.channel.BooleanInputPoll

    • Uses of BooleanInputPoll in ccre.channel

      Subinterfaces of BooleanInputPoll in ccre.channel 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  BooleanInput
      A BooleanInput is a way to get the current state of a boolean input, and to subscribe to notifications of changes in the boolean input's value.
      Classes in ccre.channel that implement BooleanInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanStatus
      A virtual node that is both a BooleanOutput and a BooleanInput.
      Methods in ccre.channel that return BooleanInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BooleanInputPoll BooleanFilter.wrap(BooleanInputPoll input)
      Returns a BooleanInputPoll representing the filtered version of the specified input.
      Methods in ccre.channel with parameters of type BooleanInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BooleanInputPoll BooleanFilter.wrap(BooleanInputPoll input)
      Returns a BooleanInputPoll representing the filtered version of the specified input.

    • Uses of BooleanInputPoll in ccre.ctrl

      Classes in ccre.ctrl that implement BooleanInputPoll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MultipleSourceBooleanController
      A controller that combines a series of registered BooleanOutputs or BooleanInputs to create a single output or input line.
      class  PauseTimer
      A PauseTimer has a boolean state for running or not, which is readable but not directly writable.

      static BooleanInputPoll BooleanMixing.xorBooleans(BooleanInputPoll a, BooleanInputPoll b)
      Return a BooleanInputPoll that is true when either specified input is true, but not both.
